review: Hi its pratima Singh.my twins were delivered by dr.nirmal gujrati sir.the best thing about him is that he understands patients.always available to them.call him anytime and he is always there to help you.i will strongly say if you have any issues please visit him once.you wont be disappointed.

Despite the unusual circumstances of going through and having abnormal uterus, he made me feel at ease throughout the entire duration of 2 months since I am meeting him. 
He has always been very responsive to all my questions and addressing all my concerns in a calm and timely manner and most important always available to solve your queries on whatsapp or call.
The best so far. Gives the best advice and treatment. **** ************** Great experience. Must visit if necessary. Recommended.
